data.eml:eml: Two new eriophyoid mites from Iran in the subfamilies Phyllocoptinae and Eriophyinae (Acari: Trombidiformes: Eriophyidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kamali, Hashem, Doryanizadeh, Nazanin, Akrami, Mohammad Ali (2018): Two new eriophyoid mites from Iran in the subfamilies Phyllocoptinae and Eriophyinae (Acari: Trombidiformes: Eriophyidae). Zootaxa 4425 (3): 589-595, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4425.3.12
